channel.title: Maps on Hoosier Mesh
channel.description: Recent content in Maps on Hoosier Mesh

item.title: Local Community
item.description:
Find nodes near you

Use these mesh maps to discover nodes in your area:

  • MeshMap.net - View the global mesh network with detailed node information
  • Liamcottle’s Meshtastic Map - Alternative map visualization

If you have a Discord account, you can also ask about other mesh users and nodes in specific areas on the Meshtastic Community Discord.

Regional community networks

Join other Indiana meshers on these regional networks:

item.title: Resources
item.description:
A curated collection of useful resources for Meshtastic users, from official tools to community-created maps and applications.

Official Meshtastic Resources

Primary Tools

  • Meshtastic.org - Official Meshtastic website and documentation
  • Meshtastic Flasher - Web-based firmware flasher for all devices
  • Site Survey Tool - Plan your mesh coverage and repeater placement
  • Meshtastic GitHub - Source code, firmware releases, and development

Documentation & Support

  • Official Documentation - Complete technical documentation
  • Community Discord - Global Meshtastic community chat
  • Nightly Firmware Builds - Bleeding edge builds (advanced users only)

Network Maps & Visualization

Discover nodes and visualize the mesh network:
